bibl.title: 'We' and Empedocles' Cosmic Lottery: P. Strasb. gr. Inv. 1665-1666, ensemble a. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Philological counterpart of: IDEM, Empedocles on the Ultimate Symmetry of the World, OSAPh 24 (2003) pp. 1-57. - Introduction: Ensemble a of P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 [edd.: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999)] and fr. B17 Diels-Kranz; -The three thêtas. - 1. The reign of Strife. - 2. Critique of Martin and Primavesi, ensemble a(ii) 3-17. - 3. Counter-interpretation of a(ii) 3-17: Chance and possible words [including a new reconstruction of lines a(i) 6 - a(ii) 17]. - 4. Commentary. - Conclusion.
